question:
You have just spend a weekend staying at The Taj hotel in Mumbai. When you get home you find out that you have left a bag at the hotel. Write a letter to the manager. Explain in the letter:
*When did you visit the hotel.
*the details of your room and the bag
* how can one identify the bag
text: I am writing this letter to bring it to your attention that I have left my belonging at your hotel during my stay.
To start with, I had a visit to your hotel during the past weekend, as I had an important meeting with my new investor. My stay at your hotel was scheduled for the 13th and 14th of august.

Moreover, I was allocated to room 1021 as you ran out of room. Furthermore, there was a messenger bag which I accidentally left over there, it is very important to me as it contains, a simple agreement of future equity (safe) note, which can help me commence my business. I vividly remember  it was kept on the dressing table, next to the wardrobe.

To illustrate it, the bag was a simple messenger bad, brown in colour with two side pockets. In addition to it, it also had the letter mark of Carlton London. I urge you to ask your room service staff to go through the room once again.
Thank you for the consideration of my request, I hope to hear a positive revert from you soon.
